translation: int.哈！(表示惊异；愉快；怀疑；胜利等)n.[化]元素hahnium的符号
examples: (1) The boy is very active, ha never flays up.(2) Her sincerity has never been questioned.(3) He has a downright pleasant manner.(4) "Then he's ill." "Ill? Ha! If ever I saw a gentleman in the pink?"
(1) 这个男孩很活跃，但从来不惹麻烦。(2) 她的诚意从未受到怀疑。(3) 他有一种令人愉快的率直态度。(4) "那么他就是病了。""病了？哈！那我怎么看见一位绅士红光满面呢？"

translation: n.习惯；习性
examples: (1) He is in the habit of rising early.(2) I have to bear with his bad habit.(3) My colleague has broken off the habit of smoking.(4) He has a habit of sunbathe for two hours a day.(5) The honeysuckle has a twining habit.
(1) 他有早起的习惯。(2) 我不得不忍受他的坏习惯。(3) 我的同事已经戒掉了吸烟的习惯。(4) 他习惯每天做两小时日光浴。(5) 忍冬有盘绕的习性。

translation: n.理发；发式
examples: (1) Where do you go to get a haircut?(2) She teased him into getting a haircut.(3) He sprang a new haircut on his wife.
(1) 你去哪儿理发？(2) 她喋喋不休地哄他去理发。(3) 他为妻子创作了一个新的发式。

translation: n.火腿；（动物）后腿v.表演过火；演技夸张
examples: (1) This ham has too much fat on it.(2) He tucked into the ham hungrily.(3) He made a ham sandwich.(4) The actor is really ham it up to amuse the audience.(5) She is the person who likes to ham it up most I have ever seen.(6) Your story is very funny, but there is no need to ham it up.
(1) 这火腿肥肉太多。(2) 他狼吞虎咽地大吃火腿。(3) 他做了一个火腿三明治。(4) 这些演员为博观众一笑,表演得实在太过火了。(5) 她是我见过的最喜欢做作的人。(6) 你的故事很能引人发笑，不过不必过分渲染。

translation: n.锤；榔头vi.锤击；反复敲打vt.锤打；严厉批评
examples: (1) He hit the nail into the wall with a hammer.(2) He smashed a hole in the window with a hammer.(3) He took a hammer and recessed a hole into the wall.(4) The teacher has been trying to hammer in the facts.(5) The police hammered the door.(6) Her latest movie was hammered by the critics.
(1) 他用一把锤子把钉子打进墙里去。(2) 他用锤子在玻璃上打了个洞。(3) 他拿起一个榔头，在墙上敲出一个洞。(4) 教师一直设法把这些事实灌输给学生。(5) 警察不停地敲门。(6) 她最近的一部电影遭到评论家的批评。

translation: n.手提包
examples: (1) She was carrying a buffalo hide handbag.(2) Do you mind if I open your handbag and check?
(1) 她拎著一个牛皮手提包。(2) 我打开你的手提包检查一下行吗？

translation: n.一把；少数；难控制的人；棘手之事
examples: (1) He dipped into the bag and brought out a handful of sample wheat.(2) All the trouble is being caused by a handful of malcontents.(3) We invited twenty people, but only a handful of them came.
(1) 他把手伸进袋里，取出一把小麦样品。(2) 这些是非都是由一小撮不满分子搬弄的。(3) 我们邀请了20 个人，但只来了寥寥数人。

translation: n.手帕；方巾；围巾
examples: (1) She was playing with her handkerchief all the while during the speech.(2) I polished my buttons with a handkerchief.(3) She embroidered her initials on the handkerchief.(4) I folded the handkerchief and put it in my pocket.(5) She fluttered her handkerchief from the train window as a good-bye.
(1) 她在演讲时一直都在玩弄手帕。(2) 我用手帕把钮扣擦亮。(3) 她把她姓名的起首字母绣在手帕上。(4) 我折好手绢，放进口袋里。(5) 她从火车窗口里伸出手挥动手帕道别。

translation: v.处理；对待；操作；触；买卖n.把手；柄
examples: (1) I was impressed by her handling of the affair.(2) The speaker was roughly handled by the mob.(3) He's not a very good teacher---he doesn't know how to handle children.(4) He knows how to handle the machine.(5) Customers are asked not to handle the goods in the shop.(6) We don't handle that sort of book.(7) I turned the handle and opened the door.(8) The handle of the hammer came away easily.(9) She burnt herself on a red-hot pan handle.
(1) 我觉得她对此事的处理很了不起。(2) 演说者受到暴民的粗暴对待。(3) 他不是一个好的老师---他不懂得如何对待孩子。(4) 他会操作这台机器。(5) 请顾客不要触摸商店里的货物。(6) 我们不经销那一类书。(7) 我转了转拉手,把门打开。(8) 这锤柄很容易脱落。(9) 她被炽热的锅柄烫伤了。

translation: adj.可观的；英俊的；慷慨大方的；灵巧的
examples: (1) The waitress received a handsome tip.(2) He is a reporter on the news,and draws a handsome screw.(3) Her bridegroom is a handsome young man.(4) Her husband is a very handsome young man.(5) She was thrilled when the handsome filmstar kissed her.(6) It's handsome of him to give me a present.(7) I got a handsome present on my birthday.(8) The little girl is pretty handsome.
(1) 女侍者收到了数量可观的小费。(2) 他是新闻记者，领取可观的薪水。(3) 她的新郎是一个英俊的年轻人。(4) 她丈夫是一个非常英俊的年轻人。(5) 当那位英俊的电影明星吻她的时候，她欣喜若狂。(6) 他慷慨大方地给了我一份送礼物。(7) 在我生日那天我收到一份出手大方的礼物。(8) 这个小女孩长得很灵巧。

translation: n.手推运货车
examples: (1) He crashed the handtruck through the doors.(2) A lady comes round the office with a tea handtruck in the afternoon.(3) A worker drove a small handtruck so carelessly that it hit the back of Mr King's legs.(4) At that time it was also the equivalent of four gallons of gas, two months’ supply of stamps, or an hour of my hard labor moving office furniture with little more than a handtruck, after tax.
(1) 他推着手推车乒乒乓乓地过了几道门。(2) 下午一位女士用手推车给办公室里的人送茶水。(3) 一个工人驾驶一辆推车时，太粗心大意了，车子竟撞着了金先生的腿肚子。(4) 当然，任何一个制度下都不能缺了他们，否则没有谏言，但是如果把他们尊为学者大师，纳入决策圈的智库，恐怕国家大业要在无止境的争吵中葬送。

translation: n.笔迹；书法
examples: (1) The handwriting on both cheques is identical.(2) It's always a problem deciphering his handwriting.(3) My handwriting cannot compete with his.(4) There is need for improvement in your handwriting.
(1) 两张支票上的笔迹完全相同。(2) 辨认他的笔迹有困难。(3) 我的书法不及他。(4) 你的书法需要改进。

translation: adj.方便的；手边的；灵巧的；近便的；现成的
examples: (1) An electric kettle is very handy.(2) The sailors clung to anything handy.(3) He is very handy at repairing clocks.(4) It is quite a handy little sailing boat.(5) Our flat is very handy for the schools.(6) The house is very handy for the shops.(7) When ideas fail, words come in very handy.
(1) 电水壶使用非常方便。(2) 水手们紧紧抓住手边任何东西。(3) 他修钟表很灵巧。(4) 这是一个相当灵巧的小帆船。(5) 我们的住所离学校很近，非常方便。(6) 这房子离商店很近便。(7) 想法失败的时候，词语就在手边。

translation: n.幸福；快乐；适当
examples: (1) Human happiness is so fragile.(2) I desire happiness.(3) Money can't buy happiness.(4) His marriage is full of happiness.(5) Her happiness at seeing him submerged her former worries.(6) Money doesn't always bring happiness.(7) He has known both grief and happiness.
(1) 人生幸福易逝。(2) 我渴望幸福。(3) 金钱买不来幸福。(4) 他的婚姻生活很幸福。(5) 她看到他非常高兴，顿时完全忘记了先前的烦恼。(6) 金钱并不一定带来快乐。(7) 忧患和快乐他都经历过。

translation: n.港口；避难所vt.庇护；心怀；窝藏vi.进入避祸所；躲藏=harbor.
examples: (1) This harbour is a natural harbour.(2) We lay at anchor outside the harbour.(3) Harbour lights were blinking on the horizon.(4) He harbours a secret grudge against his father.(5) Harbouring criminals is an offence in law.(6) Crabs harbour in holes.
(1) 这个港口是天然港。(2) 我们在港外抛锚停泊。(3) 海港的灯火在水平线上闪烁着。(4) 他对父亲暗怀不满。(5) 窝藏罪犯是犯法的。(6) 蟹躲藏在洞里。

translation: n.艰难；困苦
examples: (1) We are ready to face any hardship.(2) He will not shrink from any hardship.(3) A strong man will bear hardship without complaining.(4) His health broke after years of hardship.
(1) 我们准备好了面对任何艰难。(2) 他不会因任何艰难而畏缩。(3) 一个坚强的人会忍受困苦而不抱怨。(4) 多年的困苦生活使他的身体垮了。

translation: adj.努力工作的；勤奋的
examples: (1) China is full of hardworking people.(2) Hardworking students may see a quick improvement in their English level after a few weeks of study at our school.
(1) 中国到处都是勤奋的人。(2) 勤奋的学生在我们的学校学习几个星期以后他们的英语水平就会有很明显的进步。

translation: adj.有害的
examples: (1) The instrument sheds harmful radiations.(2) Freezing winter is harmful to orange trees.
(1) 这仪器散发有害的辐射物。(2) 冰冻天气对桔子树是有害的。

translation: adj.无害的；无恶意的
examples: (1) She developed a few harmless eccentricities.(2) No cigarette is completely harmless.(3) I made a harmless remark to some guy at the bar and he swung at me.(4) The bomb blast killed several harmless passers-by.
(1) 她逐渐养成一些无害的癖性。(2) 没有香烟是完全无害的。(3) 在酒吧里我向某个家伙说了句无恶意的话，他就向我打了一拳。(4) 炸弹爆炸使几个无辜行人受伤。

translation: n.和谐；协调；调和；和声
examples: (1) An enterprise should be full of fairness and harmony.(2) Their life is a natural harmony.(3) There was not much harmony in international affairs during those years.(4) Almost unconsciously she dressed in harmony with this note of simplicity.(5) Its harmony is grave and gentle, sad tender.
(1) 一个企业内部应该充满公平与和谐。(2) 他们的生活是一种自然的和谐。(3) 那些年国际事态不很协调。(4) 她简直不自觉的打扮得跟这朴素的调子很调和。(5) 它的和声显得既严峻又柔和，既忧伤又委婉。

translation: n.孵化；舱口，舱口盖v.孵；孵出；策划
examples: (1) The hatch date for tit eggs appears to be determined about a month earlier, when the eggs are laid.(2) Both men quickly disappeared down the hatch.(3) An incubator is used to hatch chicken.(4) The male leaves the female to hatch her eggs and looks for food.(5) Chicks are hatching from the eggs.(6) Hen's eggs take21 days to hatch out.(7) What mischief are those children hatching?
(1) 白颊山雀孵化的时间，似乎在孵化前一个月，也就是下蛋时便已决定。(2) 两个人很快从舱口下去不见了。(3) 孵卵器用来孵小鸡。(4) 雄性离开雌性去孵蛋和寻找食物。(5) 小鸡正从蛋壳里孵出来。(6) 鸡蛋需要21天才孵化。(7) 那些孩子在琢磨什么鬼花样?

translation: n.鹰；鹰派人物、主战分子；贪婪的人；清嗓v.沿街叫卖；散布；鹰扑；放鹰行猎；清嗓
examples: (1) The hawk is hovering overhead.(2) The hawk pounced on its prey and carried it off.(3) He is neither a dove nor a hawk, but betwixt and between.(4) In a free market, retailers hawk their wares.(5) He's always hawking gossip about.(6) The tribes like to hawk in the desert.
(1) 鹰在头顶上盘旋。(2) 那只鹰向那小动物猛扑过去把它叼走了。(3) 他既不是鸽派，也不是鹰派，而是中间派。(4) 自由市场里商贩们不停地叫卖着。(5) 他老是散播流言。(6) 这些部落喜欢在沙漠中带鹰打猎。

translation: n.干草；一小笔钱；床
examples: (1) The children snuggled down on the hay.(2) Make hay while the sun shines.(3) The men hit the hay early, in order to be out hunting at dawn.
(1) 孩子们舒适地蜷伏在干草上。(2) [谚]把握时机；趁热打铁。(3) 为了第二天破晓出去打猎，这些人很早就上床睡觉了。

translation: n.大字标题；新闻提要；头条新闻v.加标题于；宣扬；作主角
examples: (1) A newspaper headline caught his attention.(2) A headline on the front page draws attention to the fuller story inside.(3) A bold black headline screamed out from the front page.(4) The news headlines are broadcast on the half hour.(5) The medical breakthrough hit the headlines around the world.(6) The newspapers headlined the story of the astronauts' trip to the moon.
(1) 报纸的大标题引起他的注意。(2) 扉页上的大字标题为的是吸引你注意里面的详细内容。(3) 在头版上出现了一条令人触目惊心的粗黑体大字标题。(4) 新闻提要每到半小时正时作一次广播。(5) 那项医学上的重要突破登上全世界的头条。(6) 报纸大力报导太空人的月球之行。

translation: n.女校长
examples: (1) Well,I was moved by the dedication of the selfless headmistress.(2) The charming headmistress is giving a lecture to the students.
(1) 我对那无私女校长的奉献十分感动。(2) 那位很有魅力的女校长正在给学生上课。

translation: n.中小学的校长
examples: (1) The headteacher was wrathful with the children's unruly behavior.
(1) 校长被那些不守规矩的小学生惹得发怒。

translation: n.堆；许多；破车vt.使成堆；装满；大量给予
examples: (1) The books lay in a heap on the floor.(2) There is a disorderly heap of clothes in his room.(3) He fell down the stairs, landing in a heap at the bottom.(4) We have a heap of work to do.(5) Thanks a heap!(6) The best interest she likes is to heap up dollars.(7) He heaped the plate with food.(8) You have no right to heap insults on anybody.
(1) 书堆放在地板上。(2) 他屋里有一堆乱七八糟的衣服。(3) 他从楼梯上摔下来，直跌到楼梯底部滚成一团。(4) 我们有许多工作要做。(5) 多谢！(6) 她的最大嗜好就是攒钱。(7) 他在盘子里堆了满食物。(8) 他没有权力侮辱任何一个人。

translation: n.听力；听觉；说话或申辩的机会；审讯；听证会动词hear的现在分词.
examples: (1) He has a good faculty of hearing.(2) His hearing was impaired after the explosion.(3) Loud noise would impair your hearing.(4) Vision and hearing are exteroceptive senses.(5) You knew the hearing was set down for today.(6) We received unfair treatment during our hearing.(7) The financial committee had a hearing yesterday.(8) We are all ready for the court hearing.
(1) 他的听力生来就好。(2) 爆炸后他的听力受到了损害。(3) 大的噪音会损害你的听觉。(4) 视觉与听觉都是感受外界刺激的官能。(5) 你当时知道，审讯定于今天举行。(6) 审讯期间，我们受到了不公平的对待。(7) 昨天经济委员会召开了一个听证会。(8) 法院听证会我们都已经准备好了。

translation: n.热度；热；热烈；激烈；发烧v.(使)变热；(使)激动
examples: (1) Turn the heat down or your cake will burn.(2) I can't walk about in this heat.(3) Water is changed into steam by heat and into ice by cold.(4) So desert should take heat with cereus.(5) In the heat of the argument, Mr. Rogers lost his self-control.(6) This will relieve the heat of the fever.(7) When a fever starts and your body tries to elevate its temperature, you feel chilly and may shiver to generate heat.(8) We'll heat some water to wash clothes.(9) Just heat up the food in the microwave.(10) That were remarks made in the heat of the moment.(11) I spoke with a little heat, thinking of the bloody dirk he had hidden in his pocket, and designed, in his ill thoughts, to end me with.

(1) 把热度调低吧,要不蛋糕就要糊了。(2) 我不能在这种酷热下走路。(3) 水加热则成为蒸汽，冷却则成为冰。(4) 所以沙漠应该为仙人掌而热烈。(5) 在这激烈的争论中,罗杰斯先生失去了自制力。(6) 这会减轻发烧的热度。(7) 当发烧开始的时候，身体试着提高温度，你就会感到寒冷并且通过发抖来产生热量。(8) 我们会热点儿水洗衣服。(9) 把食物放在微波炉里热热就行了。(10) 那是一时激动之下所说的话。(11) 想到他的怀里藏着一把沾着血迹的短剑，想到他心里装着邪念，要结果我的生命，我说话时不禁有些激动。

translation: n.天空；天堂Heaven.n.上帝
examples: (1) Twinkling stars are garnishry of heaven.(2) If there's a heaven on earth, this is it!(3) Christians believe that Jesus ascended into Heaven.(4) It was the will of Heaven.
(1) 闪烁的星星是天空的装饰品。(2) 人间若有天堂，非此莫属！(3) 基督徒认为耶稣升天了。(4) 这是天意。

translation: n.脚后跟v.倾侧
examples: (1) His heel is raw because his shoe does not fit well.(2) I have a blister on my heel because my shoes are too tight.(3) The boat heeled the strong wind.
(1) 因鞋子不合适，他的脚后跟擦破皮了。(2) 鞋子太紧了，我脚后跟起了个泡。(3) 船在大风吹袭下倾到了一边。

translation: n.直升飞机vt.用直升飞机载送vi.乘直升机
examples: (1) The criminal escaped by a helicopter.(2) The shipwrecked sailors were rescued by helicopter.(3) We shuttled the passengers to the city center by helicopter.(4) The officials were helicoptered aboard the ship.(5) You can helicopter to the island.
(1) 罪犯乘直升机逃走了。(2) 遭遇海难的水手已经被直升机救起。(3) 我们来来回回地用直升机把旅客运送到市中心。(4) 官员们被用直升机送到船上。(5) 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

translation: n.头盔；安全帽
examples: (1) The sword bit the knight's helmet.(2) A miner's lamp is fixed onto his helmet.(3) The safety helmet is held on by an elastic strap.(4) All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.
(1) 剑刺穿了武士的头盔。(2) 矿灯固定在矿工的头盔上。(3) 安全帽用一根松紧带系住。(4) 到工地的所有参观者必须带上安全帽。

translation: n.母鸡；雌禽
examples: (1) The hen sits for most of the day.(2) The hen tucked her head under her wing.(3) The hen clucked when calling her chickens.(4) This hen lays beautiful brown eggs.(5) The hen has hatched all her chickens.(6) The cock has brighter coloured feathers than the hen.
(1) 这只母鸡整天大部分时间都在抱窝。(2) 那母鸡把头缩在翅膀下。(3) 母鸡唤小鸡时，发出咯咯的叫声。(4) 这只母鸡下很漂亮的棕色蛋。(5) 那只母鸡已经孵出了全部小鸡。(6) 雄鸟的羽毛比雌鸟的艳丽。

translation: n.药草；香草
examples: (1) He alighted on a rare medical herb.(2) I had to take the herb tea although it's bitter.(3) The essence drawn out from this medicinal herb is good for high blood pressure.(4) This herb can act as an antidote against snakebite.(5) Caraway has a nutty smell and is also an herb useful to digestion.(6) Parsley is an herb if you use just the greens.(7) The chicken was sauced in a fresh herb dressing.(8) A herb loaf goes well with melon salad.
(1) 他偶然找到了一种稀有的草药。(2) 虽然汤药很苦，我还是不得不喝了。(3) 从这种药草提炼出来的精华对治疗高血压有效。(4) 这种药草可以用作被蛇咬后的解毒药。(5) 香菜有一种坚果气味，也是一种对消化有益的药草。(6) 假如只食用其绿叶部分，荷兰芹是一种香草。(7) 鸡肉采用新鲜的香草佐料进行调味。(8) 香草面包和甜瓜色拉是很好的搭配。

translation: n.英雄n.男主角；男主人公
examples: (1) The hero smote the giant with his sword.(2) He is the hero of an old legend.(3) They say the hero is played by Tom Cruise.(4) Who is going to play to the hero of the play?(5) The hero of a story usually is a fine person.
(1) 英雄用剑猛劈巨人。(2) 他是一个古老传说中的英雄。(3) 据说男主角是汤姆·克鲁斯。(4) 谁来演与男主角相配的女主角?(5) 故事中的男主人公往往都是品质好的人。

translation: n.女英雄；女主角
examples: (1) This story featured a plucky heroine.(2) I cannot believe she is the heroine of the movie.(3) The heroine made her exit to great applause.
(1) 这个故事描述了一个勇敢的女英雄。(2) 我难以相信她是这部电影的女主角。(3) 女主角在热烈的掌声中退场。

translation: vi.冬眠；蛰伏；过冬
examples: (1) Bears wake for spring, summer, and fall and hibernate for the winter.(2) In the cold weather some of them hibernate. They go to sleep in all kinds of place.(3) You should hibernate before I contact with you.(4) His family often hibernates to the South.
(1) 熊在春天、夏天和秋天保持清醒,在冬季冬眠。(2) 它们有的在寒冷的天气里冬眠了。它们在各种各样的地方睡觉。(3) 在我与你联系之前，你得潜伏不动。(4) 他们家每到冬天都到南方去过冬。

translation: n.冬眠
examples: (1) Hibernation has long intrigued biologists.(2) Some animals can overwinter without the hibernation.
(1) 冬眠长期以来一直引起生物学家的兴趣。(2) 有些动物不需要冬眠也能过冬。

translation: 捉迷藏
examples: (1) The boys gave us little trouble because they spent the whole afternoon together playing hide and seek.(2) The children spent the whole afternoon together playing hide and seek.
(1) 这些男孩并不怎么麻烦我们，因为整个下午他们都在一起捉迷藏。(2) 整个下午孩子们都在一起玩捉迷藏游戏。

translation: n.公路；(水陆空)直接航线或路线
examples: (1) A four-lane highway connects the two cities.(2) This narrow highway should be broadened.
(1) 一条四车道的公路连接这两个城市。(2) 这条狭窄的公路应该加宽。

translation: n.山腰；山坡
examples: (1) The old man laboured up the hillside.(2) The path steepens as you climb the hillside.(3) The torrent scoured a gully down the hillside.(4) We walked down the woody hillside singing loudly.(5) The hillside is covered by grass and flowers in summer.
(1) 老人吃力地登上山腰。(2) 顺着山腰往上爬,小径愈发陡峭。(3) 那激流顺山坡而下冲出一条水沟。(4) 我们大声唱着歌走下树木丛生的山坡。(5) 夏天时，山坡上长满了花草。

translation: adj.多小山的；丘陵的
examples: (1) The harvest in this hilly area is very bad.(2) The hilly areas make good sheep pasture, and sheep will batten on the lush grass.(3) There is a large hilly area in the northwest.
(1) 这种多山的地区收成很不好。(2) 这一带山区是很好的牧羊场，羊吃了茂盛的青草会长得肥肥的。(3) 西北部有一大片丘陵地带。

translation: v.雇用；出租n.租金；雇用；租用
examples: (1) We don't want to hire inexperienced worker.(2) We hired an advertising company for help to sell our product.(3) Lawyers are men who hire out their words and anger.(4) They hire out boats by the hour.(5) The price includes the hire of the hall.(6) He signed up for a week's car hire.
(1) 我们不想聘用没有经验的工人。(2) 我们雇用了一家广告公司来推销我们的产品。(3) 律师,是把自己的言辞与愤怒出租于人的人。(4) 他们按小时出租小船。(5) 费用包括礼堂租金。(6) 他签订了一星期的汽车租用协议。

translation: n.蜂房；蜂箱；蜂群；喧闹繁忙的场所vi.蜂进入蜂箱；聚居；把一部分分离出来vt.使蜂入箱；储备
examples: (1) A hive cannot exist without a queen.(2) There were so many bees in the hive that I felt great fear.(3) Tapping on the hive excited the bees.(4) He built a special hive,containing only one honeycomb.(5) There is only one queen in a hive of honey bees.(6) The whole hive flew after the queen bee.(7) Tom has hived off again.(8) The director decide to hive off some part of the work and start new firm.
(1) 蜂房不可无蜂王。(2) 蜂房里有那么多蜜蜂我感到很害怕。(3) 轻拍蜂箱触动了蜜蜂。(4) 他特制了一个只有一个蜂窝的蜂箱。(5) 一个蜜蜂的蜂群中只有一只蜂后。(6) 整个蜂群跟著蜂王飞舞。(7) 汤姆又不辞而别了。(8) 董事们决定分出部分业务，另成立新公司。

translation: adj.神圣的；圣洁的；令人敬仰的
examples: (1) To the children, their father's study was the holy of holies.(2) Jerusalem was regarded as the holy place by the Christians.(3) They led a holy life.(4) The poem sings the praises of holy love.(5) The pursuit of peace is our holiest quest.
(1) 在这些孩子的眼里，父亲的书房是最神圣的地方。(2) 耶路撒冷被基督徒们认为是圣地。(3) 他们过着圣洁的生活。(4) 这首诗歌颂圣洁的爱。(5) 对和平的追求是最值得敬仰的。

translation: n.祖国
examples: (1) They yearned to go back to their homeland.(2) The overseas are very glad to set foot on their homeland.(3) He came to miss his homeland when he settled down abroad.
(1) 他们念念不忘要回到祖国。(2) 华侨们非常高兴地踏上祖国的土地。(3) 当他在国外安定下来时，他开始想念祖国了。

translation: adj.诚实的；正直的；坦率的
examples: (1) Her action declared her to be an honest woman.(2) It was commonly believed that he was an honest man.(3) The article is an attempt to defame an honest man.(4) It's an honest book but it hasn't been polished.
(1) 她的行为足以说明她是一个诚实的女人。(2) 一般都认为他是一个诚实的人。(3) 这篇文章旨在诋毁一个正直的人。(4) 这本书写得真诚坦率，但还未经润色。

translation: n.蜂蜜；甜蜜；宝贝v.说甜言蜜语；（加蜜）使甜adj.甜蜜的；亲爱的
examples: (1) This jar of pure honey weighs 350 grams net.(2) We can use honey as a substitute of sugar.(3) Love is a mixture of honey and bitterness.(4) Clear all these toys away before bedtime, honey.(5) Hi honey, are you okay? You look a little pale.(6) He always honeyed his boss.(7) Thanks for washing my pj's honey.
(1) 这瓶纯蜂蜜净重三百五十克。(2) 我们可以蜂蜜作为糖的代替品。(3) 爱情混杂着甜蜜和苦涩。(4) 宝贝儿，睡觉前把这些玩具都放回去。(5) 嗨,宝贝儿,你没事吧？你看起来有点苍白。(6) 他总是恭维他的老板。(7) 亲爱的，谢谢你帮我洗睡衣。

translation: n.荣誉；荣幸；尊敬；信用；正直；贞洁vt.尊敬；使荣幸；对...表示敬意；兑现
examples: (1) He stained the family honor.(2) I consider it a great honor to be invited to dinner.(3) He won honor for his courage.(4) I see no need to honor a pact with an evil beast, Mikhail.(5) Credit rating agencies downgraded AIG A.I.G. because of concerns it could not honor its contracts.(6) He is a man of honor.(7) November 11th is Veterans Day, when Americans honor those who served in the military.(8) Would you honor me by dining with me tonight?(9) Mrs. Dodd wanted a special day to honor her father, William Smart.(10) Please honor our arrangement by exchanging the damaged goods.

(1) 他玷污了家族的荣誉。(2) 我认为能被邀请参加晚宴是很大的荣幸。(3) 他以勇气赢得大家的尊敬。(4) 我认为没有必要跟一个邪恶怪兽讲信用，米克黑尔。(5) 由于担心美国国际集团无法承兑这些合同，信用评级机构降低了其信用度的评估。(6) 他是一个正直的人。(7) 11月11日是美国老兵纪年日，是美国人表达其对军人尊敬的日子。(8) 今晚你能赏光与我共进晚餐吗？(9) 多德夫人希望能用一个特殊的日子向她父亲-威廉·斯玛特先生表示敬意。(10) 请遵守我们的协议，给我们调换损坏的货物。

translation: n.钩；钩状物；勾拳v.钩住；弯成(钩状)；当妓女
examples: (1) Please hang your coat on the hook.(2) They took the phone off the hook so no calls would disturb them.(3) Please hook the rope over the nail.(4) She had managed to hook a wealthy husband.(5) He tends to hook his finger when he is thinking.
(1) 请把你的外衣挂在钩上。(2) 他们摘下电话听筒，以免电话打扰他们。(3) 请把绳子挂在那根钉子上。(4) 她成功地嫁到了一位有钱的丈夫。(5) 他在思考时经常弯曲手指.

translation: n.叫好声int.好哇；万岁！=hurray.
examples: (1) Let's shout hooray with all our might!(2) The assistants raised a formidable hurrah.(3) "Hurrah!" they shouted as the team scored again.(4) Hooray! You did it. That's my boy. You'll be a trumpet player when you get older.(5) Oh, we love holidays, holidays, hooray!(6) Hooray! It's the last day of school.(7) Hurrah! Hurrah! We don't have to worry about the cat any more!
(1) 让我们竭力欢呼吧！(2) 助手们发出了一片震天的欢呼声。(3) 当球队再次得分时，他们大呼“好哇！”。(4) 好哇，你办到啦，不愧是我的孩子。你再大一点就可以去吹喇叭了。(5) 哦，我们喜欢假期，假期，万岁！(6) 万岁！这是本学期在学校的最后一天了。(7) 万岁！万岁！我们再也不需要担心那只猫了。

translation: adj.有希望的
examples: (1) I'm hopeful that they'll fulfil the task on time.(2) I am very hopeful that we will be able to reach an agreement.
(1) 他们会按时完成任务，对这一点，我是抱有希望的。(2) 大家都作一点让步，那么达成协议很有希望的。

translation: adj.没有希望的；绝望的；无可救药的
examples: (1) Things are so difficult that it seems hopeless.(2) The doctor said the old man's condition was hopeless.(3) You look on this adventure over here as hopeless.(4) It functions as a sort of mid-life purgatory for hopeless souls on Earth.(5) Mido was hopeless and will surely be on his way.
(1) 事情是这样的困难，宪政是没有希望的了。(2) 医生说这位老人的病是没有希望的了。(3) 你对这儿的投机事业认为是绝望的。(4) 它的职能作为一种中年炼狱为无可救药的灵魂在地球上。(5) 米多是无药可救了，肯定会离开的。

translation: adj.可怕的；令人毛骨悚然的；令人讨厌的
examples: (1) His heart sickened at the thought of that horrible scene.(2) Everything is in a horrible muddle.(3) The sight of the battlefield was horrible.(4) Dense fog is always horrible to the driver.(5) Will you stop making that horrible noise!
(1) 他一想到那种可怕的情景就感到恶心。(2) 一切都陷入可怕的混乱。(3) 战场的情景令人毛骨悚然。(4) 对于路上的司机浓雾总是很讨厌的。(5) 你别再弄出那种讨厌的响声来行不行。

translation: n.主人；主持人；主办方；大量；寄主；主机v.主办；主持；做东
examples: (1) At the end of the party, we thanked our host and went back home.(2) He was the host for a TV talk show.(3) Which country will be the host country for the next Olympic Games?(4) A host of friends met him at the railway station.(5) An infection thread is formed by the cytoplasm of the host cell.(6) The name is not an official host name or alias.(7) Click on the virtual host you are updating.(8) We sincerely wish China success in hosting Expo 2010.(9) The Queen hosted a dinner for leaders attending the European summit.
(1) 宴会结束时,我们谢了主人后便回家去了。(2) 他是一名电视脱口秀的主持人。(3) 哪个国家将是下届奥运会的主办国？(4) 一大群朋友在火车站迎接他。(5) 侵染线是由寄主细胞的细胞质形成的。(6) 该名称不是正式的主机名或别名。(7) 单击您要更新的虚拟主机。(8) 我们衷心祝愿中国成功主办2010年世博会。(9) 女王宴请了来参加欧洲首脑会议的各国领导人。

translation: n.女主人；空姐；女主持
examples: (1) The hostess made her guests comfortable.(2) The hostess gave us a cordial greeting.(3) You need a lot of tact to be an air hostess.(4) Now that she's an air hostess, foreign travel has lost its glamour for her.(5) One of hostesses on tonight's show is Mary.
(1) 女主人使客人们感到舒适自在。(2) 女主人热忱地欢迎我们。(3) 当空中小姐言行需十分得体。(4) 她当上了空中小姐，到国外旅行对她已失去吸引力。(5) 今晚的女主持之一是玛丽。

translation: n.家庭主妇n.针线盒
examples: (1) She typifies the bored housewife.(2) Many women chose to be a housewife after marriage.
(1) 她是那种百无聊赖的家庭主妇的典型。(2) 许多妇女选择了在婚后当家庭主妇。

translation: n.长嚎；高声叫喊；啸鸣v.嚎叫；大声哭；吼叫着说出
examples: (1) The howl seemed to freeze the world with fear.(2) You can grip the club when you hear the wolf howl.(3) A sudden howl pierced the silence.(4) They listened to the howl of the wind through the trees.(5) The dog howled over its master's body.(6) The baby howled all night.(7) It's not polite to howl down a speaker.
(1) 那嚎叫声好像要令整个世界毛骨悚然。(2) 听见狼嚎你可以握紧棍子。(3) 突然一声嗥叫划破了寂静。(4) 他们听着风在林间呼啸的声音。(5) 狗对着主人的尸体哀嚎。(6) 那婴儿哇哇地哭了一夜。(7) 大喊大叫妨碍别人的讲话是不礼貌的。

translation: v.拥抱；紧抱；抱有；挨着n.拥抱；紧抱
examples: (1) It's common to hug when people meet in the US.(2) He hurries down the gangplank to hug his waiting wife.(3) The child was hugging her doll.(4) He'll never change, and will hug his cherished beliefs.(5) During the fog, we had to hug the side of the road.(6) The road hugs the river.(7) He greeted her with a loving hug.(8) She gave her mother an affectionate hug.
(1) 在美国,见面拥抱是件很平常的事。(2) 他匆匆忙忙走下跳板,张开双臂去拥抱等候着他的妻子。(3) 那孩子紧抱着她的洋娃娃。(4) 他不会改变的，他将永守他所抱的信仰。(5) 雾出现的时候，我们不得不沿着路边走。(6) 道路紧靠河边。(7) 他以一个深情的拥抱来迎接她。(8) 她紧紧拥抱著她的母亲。

translation: adj.幽默的；诙谐的
examples: (1) I have plenty of humorous tales.(2) Indeed he has a solemn face, but he is very humorous at heart.(3) She writes humorous songs when she is in the right vein.(4) It tells a romantic and humorous love.
(1) 我有许多幽默的故事。(2) 他的确有一副严肃的脸孔，但内心却是很富幽默感。(3) 她在心情不好的时候写诙谐的歌曲。(4) 它讲述了一个浪漫而诙谐的爱情故事。

translation: n.幽默；诙谐；幽默感；脾气；情绪n.体液vi.纵容；迁就=humor（美).
examples: (1) Her humour adds salt to her conversation.(2) He is completely devoid of humour.(3) Her sense of humour appealed to him enormously.(4) A sense of humour is prerequisite to understanding her work.(5) Every man has his humour.(6) He's been in a bad humour for days.(7) It is not wise to humour a small child.(8) It's always best to humour him when he's in one of his bad moods.
(1) 她很幽默，谈起话来妙趣横生。(2) 他十分缺乏幽默。(3) 她的幽默感把他强烈地吸引住了。(4) 要理解她的作品就必须具有幽默感。(5) 各人有各人的脾气。(6) 好多天来，他的情绪一直很不好。(7) 纵容一个小孩是不明智的。(8) 他心境不好的时候，最好还是迁就他。

translation: n. 饥饿； 渴望v. 饿； 渴望； 使 ... 饥饿
examples: (1) He was goaded by hunger into stealing.(2) I had experienced the pangs of hunger.(3) His hunger for knowledge drove him to the library.(4) Hunger gives relish to simple food.(5) The fat girl was attenuated by hunger.(6) His hunger for knowledge drove him to the library.(7) He was goaded by hunger into stealing.(8) I had experienced the pangs of hunger.
(1) 他为饥饿所迫而行窃。(2) 我曾经历过饥饿的折磨。(3) 他对求知的强烈渴望驱使他上图书馆。(4) 肚子饿时吃什么都香。(5) 那胖姑娘饿瘦了。(6) 他对求知的强烈渴望驱使他上图书馆。(7) 他为饥饿所迫而行窃。(8) 我曾经历过饥饿的折磨。

translation: v.狩猎；打猎；搜索n.狩猎；追捕；搜寻
examples: (1) The huntsman and I hunt the animals out of the garden.(2) Wolves hunt in packs.(3) They used to hunt with bows and arrows.(4) He goes out on the weekends to hunt for game.(5) John set out that day to hunt for work.(6) We must hunt out all the facts we can.(7) You'll have to hunt up the word in the dictionary.(8) The dog was trained to the hunt.(9) Police have launched a nationwide hunt for the killer.(10) I am on the hunt for the perfect summer sandals.
(1) 猎人和我把动物赶出花园。(2) 狼总是成群猎食。(3) 他们过去都是用弓箭打猎。(4) 他每周末都外出打猎。(5) 约翰那天外出找工作。(6) 我们必须尽可能查清全部事实。(7) 你须在字典里查找这个字。(8) 这只狗受过狩猎训练。(9) 警察已经发出全国范围内追捕杀人凶手。(10) 我在搜寻一双完美的夏日凉鞋。

translation: n.猎人；猎犬；猎马；搜寻者Hunter.n.亨特（姓氏）
examples: (1) The hunter steadied his rifle and fired.(2) The fox ran away before the hunter shot it.(3) The hunter agreed to take us to go hunting tomorrow.(4) The hunter used a dog to put up a hare.(5) When the hunter realized that the quarry had gone to earth and the dogs had lost scent, he called off the hunt.(6) The job hunter dawdled all morning but achieved nothing.(7) Hunter expects that she will come.(8) Harper made an abstract of Prof. Hunter's lecture.
(1) 猎人端稳了猎枪，然后开了火。(2) 那只狐狸在猎人向它射击前跑掉了。(3) 那位猎人同意明天带我们去打猎。(4) 那猎人用猎犬赶出一只野兔。(5) 猎人发现猎物逃入洞穴，猎犬失去了猎物的嗅迹后，他便命令猎犬停止搜索。(6) 这个找工作的人闲混了一个上午,一无所获。(7) 亨特预料她会来。(8) 哈珀将亨特教授的讲座做了摘要。

translation: n.飓风；暴风
examples: (1) The hurricane destroyed the whole village.(2) The hurricane screamed outside.(3) The hurricane has a speed of 73 miles per hour.(4) It was blowing gales of hurricane this time yesterday.
(1) 飓风把整个村子都毁掉了。(2) 外面飓风呼啸著。(3) 飓风每小时73英里。(4) 昨天的这个时候正刮着狂风。

translation: n.氢
examples: (1) Hydrogen is highly explosive.(2) Hydrogen and oxygen are gases.(3) A molecule of water consists of two atoms of hydrogen and one atom of oxygen.
(1) 氢极易爆炸。(2) 氢和氧是气体。(3) 水分子含有两个氢原子和一个氧原子。

translation: n. 头发；毛发；些微vt. 除去…的毛发vi. 生长毛发；形成毛状纤维adj. 毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的
examples: I'll have my hair trimmed tomorrow.She wears her hair in a bun.Hair is easy to collect and convenient to store.She won by a hair.We escaped by a hair's breadth.
明天我要修剪头发。她把头发盘成一个髻。毛发既容搜集又便于保存。她以微弱的优势获胜。我们从九死一生的险境中逃出。

translation: n. 一半；半场；半学年adv. 一半地；部分地adj. 一半的；不完全的；半途的n. (Half)人名；(阿拉伯)哈勒夫；(德)哈尔夫；(英)哈夫
examples: Half of them are here.At best we can do only half as much as last year.The game didn't heat up until the second half.The team recovered its lead in the second half.I have to spend half in studying the experiment in campus lab.Half the car was damaged.Mr Brown holds a half share in the business.A half truth is often no better than a lie.The girl left her homework half done.These potatoes are only half cooked.
半数人来了。我们至多只能做到去年的一半。游戏玩到后半场才热闹起来。该队在下半场重新领先。我不得不利用半学年在学校实验室研究这个实验。车子毁了一半。布朗先生拥有企业一半的股份。半真半假的话常常跟谎言一样糟。这女孩只做完了一半作业。这些土豆煮得半生不熟。

translation: n. 过道，门厅，走廊；会堂；食堂；学生宿舍；大厅，前厅；娱乐中心，会所n. （土）哈勒（人名）；（德、波、丹、芬、瑞典）哈尔（人名）；（英）霍尔（人名）；（法）阿尔（人名）
examples: The lecture is to be delivered at the hall.There was a low murmur of conversation in the hall.A multitude of people gathered at the gate of the exhibition hall.There were plenty of people in front of the town's Hall.Morning assemblage is held in the school hall.The systematic arrangement of chairs makes the hall look spacious.
演讲将在大厅进行。大厅里有窃窃私语声。大群人聚集在展览大厅的门口。在城镇的大礼堂前有许多人。晨会在学校礼堂举行。座椅按照顺序排列，这使得礼堂里显得很宽敞。

translation: n. 汉堡包，火腿汉堡；牛肉饼，肉饼；碎牛肉n. (Hamburger)人名；(英)汉堡；(瑞典)汉布里耶；(德)汉布格尔
examples: She ordered a hamburger and French fries.I had a hamburger and a fried chicken leg.Don't always eat hamburgers for meals, or else you'll get malnourished.
她叫了一客汉堡包和炸薯条。我吃一个汉堡包，一个炸鸡腿。别总把汉堡包当饭吃，不然你会营养不良的。

translation: n. 手，手艺；帮助；指针；插手vt. 传递，交给；支持；搀扶n. (Hand)人名；(英、瑞典)汉德
examples: It was written by hand.He has a book in one hand, and a pen in the other.Do you want a hand?He's always willing to give a hand to anyone who asks.He has a light hand with pastry.Please hand me that book.She helped to hand round the dishes.Most of my clothes were handed down to me by my older brother.
这是手写的。他一手拿书,一手拿笔。你需要帮忙吗？任何人有求于他,他总是乐于帮助。他很会做糕点。请把那本书递给我。她帮忙把菜传给大家。我的衣服大多是我哥哥传给我的。

translation: vt. 悬挂，垂下；装饰；绞死；使悬而未决vi. 悬着，垂下；被绞死；悬而不决n. 悬挂；暂停，中止n. (Hang)人名；(罗)汉格；(东南亚国家华语)康；(老)汉；(柬)韩(用于名字第一节)，杭
examples: You may hang your coat on the hook.I'll hang the pictures as high as I can.All the shirts hang together in the same wardrobe.Her hair hung long in the back.Cigarette smoke hung in the air.The notion hung in his mind for days.He was hanged for murder.The hang of the curtain shows that somebody is standing behind it.She was condemned to hang for killing her husband.
你可以把外套挂在钩子上。我将尽可能把这些画挂得高。所有的衬衫都挂在同一个衣橱里。她的头发长长地披在身后。香烟烟雾在空气中缭绕。几天来他老是在转这个念头。他因犯谋杀罪而被处以绞刑。窗帘悬挂的样子表明有人站在后面。她因杀害亲夫被处以绞刑。

translation: vi. 发生；碰巧；偶然遇到
examples: The accident happened at six o'clock.It is impossible to anticipate when it will happen.I happened to see her yesterday.I happen to have the official statistics with me.I tremble at the thought of what may happen.I happened on just the thing I'd been looking for.
事故发生在六点钟。不可能预料这事何时发生。我昨天碰巧见到她。我碰巧身边有官方的统计数字。我想到可能出现的情况就不寒而栗。我偶然发现了我一直在寻找的东西。

translation: adv. 快乐地；幸福地；幸运地；恰当地
examples: I often see them strolling happily arm in arm.The children were smiling happily.Look on the bright side of things, and you will live happily.A little bird was singing happily in the tree.Happily, the accident was prevented.Happily I was spared the journey and the trouble.
我经常看到他们幸福地挽臂散步。孩子们在幸福地微笑。如果看事情的光明面，你就可以活得很快乐。小鸟在树上快乐地歌唱。很幸运，事故得以避免了。幸好，我省去了这趟出行和麻烦。

translation: adj. 幸福的；高兴的；巧妙的n. (Happy)人名；(英、瑞典、喀)哈皮
examples: I am so happy to hear of your engagement.This has been the happiest day of my life.I wish you a very happy future.They had a very happy marriage.He is in the happy position of never having to worry about money.Our team would be happy to answer your questions.
听到你订婚我很高兴。这是我生活中最快乐的一天。我祝你有非常幸福的未来。他们有个幸福美满的婚姻。他真有福气，从来不需要为金钱之事操心。我们团队很乐意解答您的所有疑问。

translation: adj. 努力的；硬的；困难的；辛苦的；确实的；严厉的；猛烈的；冷酷无情的adv. 努力地；困难地；辛苦地；接近地；猛烈地；牢固地n. （Hard）人名；(英、芬、瑞典)哈德
examples: The ground is as hard as stone after the long drought.It's very hard to maintain a relationship.It's very hard on parents when their children are rebellious.He likes to pretend he is hard, but he is really soft underneath.She has really good looks but a hard heart.He gave the door a hard shove and it opened.I don't want to go out in such hard weather.We need some hard evidence to support our claim.Most importantly, you must work hard to catch up.The senator was hard opposed by her rivals on the issue of social welfare.Small businesses in particular were hit hard by the recession.You need to keep moving ahead hard and confidently.

长期干旱之后,土地硬得就像石头一样。要维持一段关系,是很困难的。对父母来说,孩子叛逆是个很棘手的问题。他喜欢故作坚强,但是他内心真的很脆弱。她确实长得漂亮,可是却有一颗残酷的心。他猛地一推门,门开了。我不想在这么冷的天气里出门。我们需要一些确凿的证据来支持我们的主张。最为重要的是,你必须努力学习,迎头赶上。那名参议员在社会福利问题上遭到对手强烈的反对。尤其是一些小企业在经济萧条中遭受了严重的打击。你要坚定而充满信心地走下去。

translation: adv. 几乎不，简直不；刚刚
examples: Hardly anybody came.He could hardly refrain himself.The desert air contains hardly any moisture.He is so excited that he can hardly sleep.She could hardly believe her ears.My legs were so weak I could hardly stand.Hardly had the game begun when it started raining.
几乎没有人来。他几乎不能自制。沙漠的空气几乎不含一点湿气。他如此兴奋，几乎不能入睡。她简直不能相信自己的耳朵。我的腿软得简直不能站立。比赛刚刚开始就下起雨来。

translation: n. 伤害；损害vt. 伤害；危害；损害n. (Harm)人名；(德)哈尔姆
examples: If we interfere, it may do more harm than good.It wouldn't do him any harm to work a bit harder.The army defends the people from harm .His failures did his reputation a lot of harm.Excessive drinking did harm to his health.There was a traffic accident in this street, but no one was harmed.We little believed that he would harm us.I won't harm you if you let me talk.Don't harm your eyes by reading in dim light.Will this cleaning fluid harm the furniture?It did harm the relative power of the Japannese state.
倘若我们进行干预，那可能弊多利少。工作努力点对他没什么害处。军队保护人民免遭伤害。他屡次失败使他的声誉受到很大损害。过量饮酒损害了他的健康。这街上发生了交通事故，但没有人受伤。我们一点也不相信他会伤害我们。只要你让我谈，我就不伤害你。不要在昏暗的灯光下看书,以免损害眼睛。这种清洁剂会损害家俱吗?它损害了日本国的相对实力。

translation: n. 收获；产量；结果vt. 收割；得到vi. 收割庄稼
examples: It happened that the harvest was bad in 1988.The fine summer harvest was not easily come by.The harvest has been safely gathered in.We are all very busy because it's the harvest time.They turned the soil after the harvest.We all helped the harvest.The peasants are harvesting rice in the field.The research yielded a rich harvest.He reaped the harvest of his hard work.The new medicine is the harvest of thirty years' research.He should reap the harvest of his mistakes.Farmers harvest their crops in fall.Currently it is the high season to harvest narcissus bulbs.Next week they will harvest the corn.It's still too early to harvest the wheat now.It's the busy time for them to harvest their fields.

碰巧一九八八年的收成很糟。夏季的好收成不是容易得来的。庄稼已妥善收获完毕。因为现在是收获期，所以我们都非常忙。他们在收获后翻耕土壤。我们都帮忙收割。农民们正在田野里收割稻子。该项研究有了丰硕的成果。他获得辛勤劳动的成果。这种新药是三十年研究的成果。他应该承受错误造成的后果。农民秋天收获庄稼。那现在正好是水仙收获的季节。他们下星期收割玉米。现在收割小麦为时过早。现在正是他们在地里收割庄稼的繁忙季节。

translation: v. 有，吃，得到，从事，允许，雇用，享有（have的第三人称单数）；（亲属关系中）接受；拿；买到
examples: My husband has several shirts of different colors.Listening to the music has a calming influence on her.He has fooled a lot of people into believing he is a rich man.
我丈夫有好几件颜色不同的衬衫。听音乐对她起了一种镇静的作用。他骗了许多人，让人相信他是个富翁。

translation: n. 帽子vt. 给……戴上帽子vi. 供应帽子；制造帽子n. (Hat)人名；(中)核(广东话·威妥玛)
examples: She bought a hat yesterday.He took off the hat and revealed his bald head.He always wears a panama hat.The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.She is wearing a pert little hat.The young lady was beautifully dressed and hatted.
她昨天买了一顶帽子。他脱下帽子，露出秃头。他总戴着一顶巴拿马草帽。魔术师从他的帽子里变出一只兔子。她头戴一顶小巧别致的帽子。那位小姐身着漂亮衣服, 头戴华丽帽子。

translation: vt. 憎恨；厌恶；遗憾vi. 仇恨n. 憎恨；反感n. (Hate)人名；(法)阿特
examples: They hate each other.I hate to squabble with my wife about money.The boys hate doing homework on Sundays.She hates to be late for work.She looked at him with hate in her eyes.Plastic flowers are a particular hate of mine.A hidden hate cropped out in her words.
他们彼此憎恨。我厌恶为钱的事兴太太争吵。男孩们讨厌在星期日做家庭作业。她不喜欢上班迟到。她以憎恨的目光看着他。塑料花是我特别厌恶的东西。她言语中流露出怨恨之意。

translation: vt. 有；让；拿；从事；允许aux. 已经n. (Have)人名；(芬)哈韦；(德)哈弗
examples: A country must have the will to repel any invader.The police have absolute proof of his guilt.Have a glass of beer to rinse your dinner down.We will have pork chops for dinner.We have a right to a living wage.You will have your reward in the fullness of time.To do this job, you must have a degree in English.I have five years` experience of office work.We can't have that sort of thing happening.She won't have boys arriving late.But Chi might have hired a killer to murder them.We have taken on extra staff to cope with the increased workload.Children and adult shall have equal rights.Vehicles coming from the right have priority.

一个国家得有决心击退任何入侵者。警方有他犯罪的确凿证据。喝杯啤酒把你吃的晚饭冲下去。我们晚餐吃猪排。我们有权得到足够维持生活的工资。时机一到你就会得到酬报。从事这个工作你必须具有英语专业的大学学位。我有五年从事办公室工作的经验。我们不能允许发生这样的事。她不允许这些男孩子迟到。但很有可能是戚秦氏雇用杀手杀死的。我们已经额外雇用员工来应付增加了的工作量。儿童和成年人应该享有平等的权利。从右边驶来的车辆享有优先通行权。

translation: n. 男孩，男人；它（雄性动物）pron. 他n. (He)人名；(日)户(姓)；(朝)海；(柬)赫
examples: He is a teacher.It was not until he came that I left.He beat the other runners by a margin of ten seconds.Everybody knows what he wants.What a sweet puppy! Is it a he or a she?
他是教师。直到他来我才离开。他比其他运动员早10秒钟到达终点。人人都知道自己想要的是什么。多可爱的小狗哇！是公的还是母的?

translation: n. 头；头痛；上端；最前的部分；理解力vt. 前进；用头顶；作为…的首领；站在…的前头；给…加标题vi. 出发；成头状物；船驶往adj. 头的；主要的；在顶端的n. (Head)人名；(英)黑德
examples: Please raise your head and look at the blackboard.The stone caught him on the side of the head.He had no head for business.We walked straight to the head of the line.He is the head of our school.After Yao died, Shun became head of the tribal confederation.A coin has two sides,a head and a tail.We are heading home.I would have a chance to head northward quickly.We elected Mr. Stevenson to head the team.The road heads the east.My mother is the head librarian of the school library.He got shocked by the head name on the list.
请抬起头来，看黑板。那块石头击中他头部的侧面。他毫无商业头脑。我们一直朝线路的顶端前进。他是我们学校的校长。尧去世后，舜继承了部落联盟领袖的位置。硬币有正反两面。我们正向家的方向走去。我很快就有机会去北方了。我们选举了斯蒂文森先生率领这个队。这条路一直朝东。我的妈妈是学校图书馆管理员组长。看到名单上的第一个名字,他震惊不已。

translation: n. 头痛；麻烦；令人头痛之事
examples: I've got a headache.The aspirins eased my headache.I've got a splitting headache.This is another big headache for him.
我头痛。阿司匹林使我头疼减轻。我头疼得要裂开似的。这是另一件使他非常头痛的事。

translation: n. 校长
examples: The headmaster patted the pupil on the shoulder.My father is a headmaster of a primary school.
校长轻轻拍拍那个学生的肩膀。我父亲是小学校长。

translation: n. 健康；卫生；保健；兴旺
examples: Smoking is harmful to your health.Fresh air and exercise are good for the health.It is generally believed that health is above wealth.Hospital mamagers are urging the government to spend more on health.
吸烟对你的健康有害。新鲜空气和运动有益于健康。一般人都相信健康重于财富。医院的管理者们要求政府在医疗保健上加大支出。

translation: adj. 健康的，健全的；有益于健康的
examples: Although my uncle is old, he looks very strong and healthy.A healthy shoot should form a strong graft.His inmost thoughts are not healthy.
我的叔叔虽然老了，但他看上去还是很健壮。健康的嫩枝可以长成强壮的接穗。他心灵深处的思想是不健康的。

translation: vt. 听到，听；听说；审理vi. 听；听见
examples: How did you hear about us? How did you hear about this job?Have you heard the news?I heard (that) he was ill.We'd better hear what they have to say.I heard someone laughing.Did you hear him go out?He was heard to groan.The court heard the evidence.Which judge will hear the case?
你是如何得知我们的?如何得知这个工作的?你听到那消息了吗？我听说他病了。我们还是听听他们要说些什么吧。我听见有人笑。你听到他出去了吗?有人听见他在呻吟。法庭听取了证词.哪位法官（将）审理这案件？

translation: n. 心脏；感情；勇气；心形；要点vt. 鼓励；铭记vi. 结心n. (Heart)人名；(英)哈特
examples: My heart was thumping with excitement.Mr Jones has a long history of heart trouble.He has a kind heart.Let's get to the heart of the matter.We should get to the heart of the matter.I think one heart is the better opening for this hand.When the opposite leads a spade you should not have played a card of the heart suit that has been leaded.
我激动得心怦怦跳。琼斯先生有长期的心脏病史。他心地善良。让我们谈谈这件事的核心部分。我们应该把握住事情的实质.我看这手牌开叫一红桃比较好。当对方打一张黑桃你本来不应该出已经打过的红桃。

translation: adj. 沉重的；繁重的，巨大的；拥挤的；阴沉的n. 重物；严肃角色adv. 大量地；笨重地
examples: As we are booking heavy orders, we would advise your order at once.He made efforts to move the heavy furniture.The lead is heavy and the plastic is light.We had heavy hearts as we went to a funeral.The soldiers kept the field under heavy fire.A rainbow is usually seen after a heavy rain.
因为我方的订单量非常大,我方建议贵公司毫不犹豫地立即下订单。他努力搬动沉重的家具。铅是重的，而塑料是轻的。我们怀着沉重的心情参加葬礼。士兵们冒着猛烈的炮火坚守阵地。大雨之后常有彩虹。

translation: adv. 沉重地；猛烈地；沉闷地
examples: The truck was heavily loaded.He sat down heavily.The crime lies heavily on his conscience."I don't understand you," she said heavily.It was snowing heavily.He is drinking heavily.This area is heavily populated.
这辆卡车装载很重。他重重地坐了下来。那罪行沉重地压在他心上。"我不明白你,"她闷闷不乐地说道。天正在下大雪。他酒喝得很厉害。这一地区人口稠密。

translation: n. 高地；高度；身高；顶点
examples: They looked down from a giddy height.His height makes him stand out in the crowd.The climber fell from a great height.Pop art was at its height in the early 1960s.She quitted at the height of her fame and fortune.
他们从令人眩晕的高度往下看。他身材高大，因此在人群中很突出。攀登者从极高的地方坠落下来。通俗艺术在二十世纪六十年代初最为流行。她在名利双收的鼎盛时期隐退了。

translation: int. 喂；哈罗n. 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语n. (Hello)人名；(法)埃洛
examples: Hello, it's me.Hello, it's us back again!Say hello to your husband.I said hello to her, but she ignored me completely!She actually condescended to say hello to me in the street today.
喂，是我呀。喂，是我们回来了！问你的丈夫好。我向她打招呼，可她根本不理我！她今天在街上竟能屈尊跟我打招呼。

translation: vt. 帮助；促进；治疗；补救n. 帮助；补救办法；帮忙者；有益的东西vi. 帮助；有用；招待n. (Help)人名；(芬)海尔普
examples: Your advice helped me a lot.I'll do everything possible to help you.Trade helps industry to develop.This latest development doesn't exactly help.Local assembly will help sale to some extent.He's been helping himself to my stationery.He can't help having big ears.She burst out laughing and couldn't help herself.Thank you for your kind help.You must reckon without his help in this matter.We'll need outside help before we can finish.You're a good help to me.The help has not come this morning .Aaah, the monster's coming. Run! Help!
你的意见对我大有帮助。我会尽一切可能帮助你。贸易促进工业发展。这一最新情况对事情并没有真正好处。在当地组装将在某种程度上促进产品销售。他未经许可一直用我的文具。他爱打听别人的事。她突然大笑起来,无法克制自己。谢谢你好意相助。在这件事情上,你切不可指望他的帮助。我们需要外界援助才能完成。你是我的得力帮手。仆人今早没有来。啊，怪物出来了，快跑啊！救命啊！

translation: adj. 有帮助的；有益的
examples: You are very helpful.These things are helpful for my life.These tactics are unlikely to be helpful to you.The experience in army is helpful to him.
您真帮了我的大忙。而且对我的生活是有帮助的。这种方法对你未必有用。他从军的经历对他很有用。

translation: pron. 她（she的宾格）；她的（she的所有格）；她（指某个国家；一艘船）n. （法）埃尔（人名）
examples: That's her book.Give her the book.
那是她的书。把这本书给她。

translation: adv. 在这里；此时int. 嘿！；喂！n. 这里n. (Here)人名；(罗)赫尔施
examples: It is neither hot nor cold in winter here.He has lived here for the last few years.Here he stopped reading and looked up.The bell here rang for the third time.I am afraid there is some misunderstanding here.You may well have a good point here.From here on the story gets more interesting.Here, catch hold of this parcel.Here, where are you going with that?
这里冬天既不热也不冷。过去的几年他一直住在这里。这时他停止看书,抬头看了看。这时,铃声第三次响起来了。对不起，在这点上有此误解。在这点上,你很可能说得有道理。故事从这往后更加有趣。嘿，接住这个包。喂，你要把它拿到哪儿去?

translation: pron. 她的（所有格）n. (Hers)人名；(法)埃尔
examples: Your appearance is identical to hers.This book is hers.
你的相貌和她的一模一样。这本书是她的。

translation: pron. 她自己（she的反身代词）；她亲自
examples: She kept on muttering to herself.She braided her hair by herself.After her swim she dried herself with a towel.She should do her homework herself.Mary herself patiently attended the sick man.She went out herself and spoke to the chauffeur.
她老是一个人嘀嘀咕咕。她自己梳辫子。游泳后，她用毛巾擦干身子。她应该自己做作业。玛丽亲自耐心地护理病人。她亲自走出去跟汽车司机说话。

translation: int. 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）n. 干草（等于hay）n. (Hey)人名；(法)埃；(柬)海；(德、英)海伊
examples: Hey lady you can't park there!Hey, I'm out of water.Hey, I almost forgot! John asked you to give him a ring.Hey! For goodness sake.Hey! You!
嘿，小姐--那儿不能停车！喂，我没水了。嗨，差点儿忘了！约翰请你给他打个电话。嗨！看在上帝份上。嗨！你！

translation: int. 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）n. (Hi)人名；(柬)希
examples: Hi there, buddy!Hi there, Stevens.Hi! Great show, eh?Hi, there.Hi, you must he Jane from Australia. I'm Zhou Lin from Qinghua University.Hi, Maxine I need your advice. Got a minute?Hi. Long time no see.
嘿，老兄！你好，史蒂文斯。你好！好节目，是吗？嗨，你好。嗨，你一定是从澳大利亚来的简。我是清华大学的周林。嗨，麦卡西。我想听一下你的建议。有时间吗？(嗨，好久不见了。)

translation: vt. 隐藏；隐瞒；鞭打vi. 隐藏n. 躲藏；兽皮；躲藏处
examples: I hid the broken plate behind the table.I hide the message in a cleave in the rock.She tried to hide her feelings.The future is hidden from us.The trees hid the house from view.The boots are made of buffalo hide.
我把打碎的盘子藏在餐桌后面了。我把情报藏在石块的裂缝里。她设法不表露自己的感情。未来是我们难以预卜的。树木把房屋遮挡住了.这双靴子是由水牛皮制成的。

translation: adj. 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的n. 高水平；天空；由麻醉品引起的快感；高压地带adv. 高；奢侈地n. (High)人名；(英)海伊
examples: He earned a high reputation for his learning.It's unsafe to sit the child in such a high chair.My grandma was a woman of high principles.He is a high official in the government.This doctor received high praise from everyone.He likes swimming in high summer.The plane flew high above.He tested high in English, but low in Physics.We lived high off the hog for two whole weeks while we were on holiday.The bird sang high and clearly in the tree.Grain output reached a new high in the three years.A high over southern Europe is bringing fine sunny weather to all parts.The high lasted all night.
他在学识方面享有很高的声誉。让小孩坐在这么高的椅子上不安全。我祖母是一位道德高尚的人。他是政府的高级官员。这位医生受到所有人的高度赞扬。他喜欢在盛夏游泳。飞机高高地在上空飞。他在英语测验中考了高分，但在物理测验中却考出低分。我们在度假期间过了整整两周的奢侈生活。鸟儿在树上清脆地高歌。谷物产量达到三年中最高水平。欧洲南部上空的反气旋给各地区带来了晴朗的好天气。那种快感持续了一整夜。

translation: n. 小山；丘陵；斜坡；山冈n. (Hill)人名；(法、西)伊尔；(德、英、匈、捷、罗、芬、瑞典)希尔
examples: Trees crowned the hill.We found the animal on a scrub hill.The hill was buried under 11 inches of snow.We walked down the hill before sunset.We ran down the hill along the gentle slope.Would you please hill the leaves in the backyard?She used to hill the plants in her garden once a month.
树木覆盖着小山。我们在一个灌木丛生的丘陵上找到这动物。这丘陵上覆盖着11英寸厚的大雪。我们在日落前走下山冈。我们顺着和缓的斜坡跑下山。你能把后院的树叶扫成堆吗?她以前每个月都要给花园里的植物培一次土。

translation: pron. 他（宾格）n. (Him)人名；(东南亚国家华语)欣；(柬)亨；(中)谦(广东话·威妥玛)
examples: The accident left him with paralysis of the legs.His blindness is a great trial to him.
事故使他双腿瘫痪。眼睛瞎对他来说是非常麻烦的事。

translation: pron. 他自己；他亲自，他本人
examples: He is smart and can take care of himself.His new house was built by himself, brick by brick.
他很精明可以照顾他自己。他的新房子是他自己一块砖一块砖砌起来的。

translation: pron. 他的n. (His)人名；(法)伊斯
examples: Next Tuesday is his birthday.He claims it was his idea.His brother is my classmate.His name leapt out at me from the newspaper.The writer gets a 10% royalty on each copy sold of his book.This book is his, not yours.If you can't find your hat, take his.
下周二是他的生日。他声称这是他的主意。他哥哥是我的同学。报纸上他的名字一下子跳入我的眼帘。作者从每本卖出的书中可得10%的版税。这本书是他的，不是你的。如果你找不到你的帽子，就用他的。

translation: n. 历史，历史学；历史记录；来历
examples: The English language has an interesting history.China is an oriental country with a long history.He specializes in oriental history.He asked a little about my life history.I'd like you to fill out this medical history form.That is all history now. Don't worry about it.
英语有着饶有趣味的发展历史。中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。他专门研究东方史。他简单地问了一下我的履历。请你填写一下病历单。那都是过去的事了，别挂在心上。

translation: vt. 打击；袭击；碰撞；偶然发现；伤…的感情vi. 打；打击；碰撞；偶然碰上n. 打；打击；（演出等）成功；讽刺
examples: The ball hits against the wall.She hits at him.His career reached a new high with the hit song.User has hit the runaway recall limit.Don't hit him up for anything else but breakfast.They insisted on state help being given to the worst hit areas.The sudden hit knocked two teeth out of his mouth.A stone hit the car and damaged the paintwork.Researchers will be studying the soil on the moon via the hit to examine how the soil is eroded by radiation and micrometeoroids.Hit the ground running in these specially designed paratrooper boots with extra high ankle support and snug, long lacing.He hit upon a photo taken ten years ago.In fact, most people would like to hit upon something that makes them fabulously rich!That last remark was a hit at me.A stone hit the car and damaged the paintwork.The coach hit his man with the flat of my sword.The lorry ran into the back of the rearmost car in the queue which bumped into the car in front, which then hit the next one, and so on in a chain reaction.

球撞到了墙上。她朝他打去。该首大热歌曲助他的歌唱事业达到一个新的高峰。用户已达到超越撤回界限。除了早饭外，甭向他提出别的啥子要求。他们坚持要求把国家的支援拨给受灾最重的地区。这突然的一击把他的牙齿打掉了两颗。有个石子击到汽车上，打坏了漆面。研究人员将通过此次碰撞来研究月球土壤如何遭受辐射物质和微流星体的侵袭。碰撞地面运动的特别行动伞兵靴，额外高度的靴筒提供对踝部的支撑和保暖，全长度侧链能快速的脱卸和穿上。他偶然发现一张十年前拍的照片。事实上，大多数人都想偶然发现什么东西可以使他们暴富。最后的话是对我的讽刺。有个石子击到汽车上，打坏了漆面。教练用剑面打他的运动员。那辆卡车撞到了队伍中最后面一辆汽车的尾部，汽车又冲撞到前面的汽车，前面的汽车又碰撞到了再前面的，这形成了连锁的反应。

translation: n. 嗜好；业余爱好n. (Hobby)人名；(英)霍比
examples: His hobby is entomology.Angling is his main hobby.Some people like horseback ride, but I prefer golf as a hobby.My hobby is a good safety-valve for the tension that builds up at work.One of my hobbies is painting.His hobby employs much of his time.Do you think cycling is a good hobby?
他爱好昆虫学。钓鱼是他的主要爱好。一些人喜欢马术，但是我宁愿把打高尔夫球作为一种业余爱好。我用业余爱好来消除工作中产生的紧张情绪。我的业余爱好之一是画画。他的业余爱好占用他许多时间?你认为骑车是种很好的业余爱好吗?

translation: vt. 持有；拥有；保存；拘留；约束或控制vi. 支持；有效；持续n. 控制；保留n. (Hold)人名；(英、德、捷)霍尔德又作“Hold住”使用，中英混用词汇，表示轻松掌控全局。[ 过去式 held 过去分词 held或holden 现在分词 holding ]
examples: I want you to stand beside me and hold the torch.He has been trying hard to hold his temper.The new football stadium can hold eighty thousand people.I'll always be the one to firmly hold your hands.They hold different views on this matter.I fear that this fine weather won't hold much longer.Executive power is held by the president.We hold that all nations should be equal.We held a party to celebrate our success.His hold on her arm tightened.Their forces had consolidated their hold on the area.You have to get a good hold of this idea.When you are climbing, you need to find a good hold to prevent you from falling.There was an aeroplane hold again due to the heavy fog.He has a tremendous hold over his younger brother.

我要你拿着手电筒站在我旁边。他一直尽力控制自己不发脾气。新的足球场可以容纳八万人。我永远都会坚定地握住你的手。他们对这个问题持有不同的观点。我担心这样的好天气保持不了多久。执行权由董事长掌握。我们认为所有国家都应一律平等。我们举行宴会庆祝我们的成功。他把她的胳膊抓得更紧了。他们的军队加强了对这一地区的控制。你得好好把握这个观点。攀登时,你需要找一个好的立足点来避免摔落。由于大雾天气,飞机又一次延误了。他对他弟弟很有影响。

translation: n. 洞，孔；洞穴，穴；突破口vi. 凿洞，穿孔；（高尔夫球等）进洞vt. 凿洞n. (Hole)人名；(瑞典、挪)霍勒；(英)霍尔
examples: There is a hole in my sock.The dog skins through the small hole in the wall.He chiseled a hole in the door to fit a new lock.The hunters blocked up the hole of the beast.He tried hard to pick a hole in what I said, but to no avail.He was in a hole with his finances.Having lost my money puts me in rather a hole.They will hole a tunnel through the mountain.She holed out from forty yards.
我的袜子上有个洞。那条狗勉强钻过小小的墙洞。他在门上凿了个孔，以便装一把新锁。猎人堵住了兽穴。他极力想从我的话里找出漏洞, 可是没有得逞。他财政陷入困境。丢了钱使我陷于困境。他们将穿山打隧道。她从四十码远的地方把球打入洞中。

translation: n. 假日；节日；休息日vi. 外出度假n. (Holiday)人名；(英)霍利迪
examples: Our holiday plans are still at an indeterminate stage.Did you have a nice holiday?We are going to France to spend our holidays.The best holiday of the year is Chinese New Year.What kind of a holiday is Thanksgiving?
我们的假日计划还没有确定。你假期过得愉快吗？我们将去法国度假。一年中最好的节日就是中国的新年。感恩节是一个什么样的节日?

translation: n. 家，住宅；产地；家乡；避难所adv. 在家，回家；深入地adj. 国内的，家庭的；有效的vt. 归巢，回家n. (Home)人名；(德、芬)霍梅；(英、尼)霍姆
examples: She lives a long way from home.My home isn't very big, but very comfortable.He is planning to establish a home.The aged is taken care of in the old folks home.The lake is noted as a home to many birds.New Orleans is the home of jazz.Is he home from work?I bought the magazines on my way home.He punched out and went home at six o'clock.The delegation will be home next week.He struck the nail home.This is my home phone number.These products are for home sale.Our home office is in New York.Please let us know as soon as you hear from your home office?The home team won the game.The referee just called a penalty on the home team.Someone will home you when you arrive there.The plane homed in on the radio beacon.

她远远地离开故乡在外地生活。我家不很大，但很舒适。他正计划建立家庭。老年人在养老院里受到照顾。这个湖作为许多鸟类的栖息地遐迩闻名。新奥尔良是爵士音乐的发源地。他下班回家了吗？在回家的路上，我买了一些杂志。她六点钟打卡下班回家了。代表团将于下周回国。他将钉子完全打进去。这是我家的电话号码。这些产品是供国内销售的。我们的总部设在纽约。一收到国内总部的来电就请通知我们。主队赢得了比赛。裁判判罚主场的球队。你到那儿后，有人会给你安排住处的。飞机遵循导航台信号降落。

translation: n. 家乡；故乡
examples: I can come back to my hometown some day.His hometown is an insignificant city on the map.My hometown is in the upper reaches of the river.I spent my early childhood in my hometown.I am attached to every tree and bush in my hometown.
总有一天我会回到家乡。他的家乡只是地图上一个不起眼的小城。我的家乡在这条河的上游地区。我在故乡度过了自己的孩提时代。我依恋故乡的一草一木。

translation: n. 家庭作业，课外作业
examples: He has done only a fraction of his homework.I must finish my homework first.
他只做了家庭作业的一小部分。我必须首先做完家庭作业。

translation: 香港
examples: They discharged the cargo at Hong Kong.He got three years for pulling a job in Hong Kong.
他们在香港卸了货。他因在香港行窃被判刑三年。

translation: n. 荣誉；尊敬；勋章vt. 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据n. (Honour)人名；(英)昂纳
examples: He has the best claim to the honour.His action profaned the honour of his country.I also have the desire to take the light-welterweight title, and it's a big honour to be in another fight which the fans want to see.You do us a great honour by attending.We esteem it an honour to be invited.Children should honour their father and mother.Nevertheless, my name will be remembered, and men will honour me.You must honour him who will honour you.We demand that they honour this agreement .The strong powers must honour their commitments to smaller nations.The bank will not always honour your debts.Fifty heads of state attended the Queen's coronation to do her honour.They remove their hats to honour the flag.

他最有资格获得这荣誉。他的行为玷污了国家的荣誉。我要拿下超轻量级头衔，拳迷喜欢这样的比赛，我深感荣幸。你肯光临使我们感到无比荣幸。我们能受到邀请不胜荣幸。小孩应该尊敬他们的父母。尽管如此，我的名字总会有人记得，人们会尊敬我。你必须尊重别人，他才会尊重你。我们要求他们信守这一协议。大国应该履行对小国所作的承诺。银行不会总是给你承兑债务。五十位国家元首参加了女王的加冕典礼，向女王表示敬意。他们脱帽向国旗致敬。

translation: n. 希望；期望；信心vt. 希望；期望vi. 希望；期待；信赖n. (Hope)人名；(印)霍普；(法)奥普；(西)奥佩
examples: I hope to announce the winner shortly.After these dry days, everyone hopes for rain.I hope he will be adequate to the job.And hope is what Yad Vashem is all about!Everybody needs laughter and hope.The doctors held out no hope of recovery.I called in the hope of finding her at home.Do you have any hope that he'll come?
我希望马上宣布胜利者的名字。干燥的天气之后，人人都希望下雨。我希望他将胜任这一工作。而盼望正是大屠杀纪念馆的主旨。每个人都需要欢笑和盼望。医生们对痊愈不抱希望。我希望她能在家才给她打的电话。你想他会来吗？

translation: n. 马；骑兵；脚架；海洛因vt. 使骑马；系马于；捉弄vi. 骑马；作弄人n. (Horse)人名；(瑞典)霍尔瑟
examples: The horse jumped the fence.He withdrew his horse from the race.She sat her horse well.Do you like to horse with me this afternoon?My father bought a horse blanket.He saw the horse guards.
那匹马跃过了栅栏。他让他的马退出了比赛。她善於骑马。今天下午你愿意陪我去骑马吗?我父亲买一条骑马用的毯子。他看见了骑兵卫队。

translation: n. 医院n. (Hospital)人名；(英)霍斯皮特尔
examples: When I left the hospital I was completely cured.If you go to a private hospital you must pay.
出院时，我已经完全痊愈了。如果你去一家私立医院就诊，你得付费。

translation: adj. 热的；辣的；热情的；激动的；紧迫的adv. 热；紧迫地vi. 变热vt. 增加；给…加温n. (Hot)人名；(塞)霍特；(法)奥特
examples: A bowl of hot chicken soup is good for you.The hot weather has soured the milk.This dish is a bit hot.I could not bear with his hot temper.This food is best while eaten hot.I am going to hot up some food for you.Things were beginning to hot up again there.
喝一碗热鸡汤对你有好处。炎热的天气使牛奶变酸了。这道菜有些辣。我忍受不了他那急躁的脾气。这道菜趁热吃最好。我去给你热点饭。那儿的局势又开始紧张起来。

translation: v. 卖弄n. 热狗（面包）
examples: There is a small hotdog stand outside.Bob washed down the hotdog with a bottle of Coke.It is not easy to hotdog down the ski slopes.
外面有家卖热狗的小店。鲍勃就着一瓶可乐把热狗吃了下去。要在滑雪坡道上卖弄技巧可不是那么容易的。

translation: n. 旅馆，饭店；客栈vt. 使…在饭店下榻vi. 进行旅馆式办公n. (Hotel)人名；(法)奥泰尔
examples: This is the identical hotel we stayed at last year.The front of the postcard shows a picture of our hotel.We stayed at a small hotel.I have engaged a room at this hotel.He is looking for job in the hotel industry.The hotel is situated at the edge of the town.Rooms in this hotel are comfortless.If all were ready, we'd better start for the hotel.He left the hotel with his suites yesterday.I would like to book a room in your hotel.The hotel is located in the center of the city.
这就是我们去年住过的旅馆。明信片正面是我们旅馆的图片。我们住在一家小旅馆里。我已经在这个旅馆里预订了一个房间。他正试着在饭店找份工作。该饭店坐落于市区的边缘。那家宾馆没有舒适的房间。如果一切都准备好了，我们最好动身去宾馆吧。他昨天带着一群随员离开了那家酒店。我想在你们的酒店定一个房间。该酒店位于市中心。

translation: n. 小时；钟头；课时；…点钟n. (Hour)人名；(法)乌尔；(柬)胡
examples: It took him half an hour to finish the work.The London bus departs every hour on the hour.You can hire a bicycle by the hour to go around the city.The boy will sit there hour after hour looking at the traffic go by.
他花了半个小时做完这项工作。伦敦的公共汽车每小时零分开出一趟。你可以按钟点租辆自行车在城里观光。那男孩常常坐在那里好几个钟点,看着车辆行人通过。

translation: n. 住宅；家庭；机构；议会；某种用途的建筑物vt. 覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内vi. 住n. (House)人名；(英)豪斯
examples: Her house is furnished in excellent taste.They are going to move to a new house next week.My dream is to have a big house among peach trees.Be quiet or you'll wake the whole house!He designs for a famous fashion house.The failure of the great London banking house was quickly noised about.The party has a working majority in the house.There was one episode, in particular, that held the house from floor to ceiling.His address soon drew a good house.The 12th house rules our subconscious mind.He tried to feed and house his family.The library houses about three million books.The classroom can house sixty students.The area will house about 12 000 people.Those caves may house snakes or some other wild animals.

她的房屋布置得非常高雅。下星期他们将迁入新居。我的梦想就是在桃林间拥有一座大房子。安静点吧，别把全家人都吵醒了！他在一间著名的时装商店当设计师。这家伦敦大银行倒闭的消息很快就传遍各地。这个党在议院中占有大多数的席位。特别是有一个情景，紧扣全场观众的心弦。他的演说很快地就吸引了大批听众。第十二宫统治我们的潜意识。他设法为一家人解决吃和住的问题。该图书馆收藏了约三百万册书。教室可容纳六十名学生。该区将可容纳约12000人口。那些洞里也许有蛇或者其它什么野兽。

translation: n. 家务事
examples: Housework is usually miscellaneous and toilsome.Her hands were roughened by housework.
家务劳动通常是繁杂的。她的手由于家务劳动而变得粗糙。

translation: adv. 如何；多少；多么n. 方法；方式conj. 如何n. (How)人名；(英)豪
examples: How can we divert her thoughts from her sad loss?How can I drive away these feelings of sadness?How pleasant it is to dine on Chinese food!How grand the mountains look in the early evening!How are you doing with your new boss?It was difficult to gauge how people would respond.I wonder how he got voted out of office.Let me show you how our filing system works.How do I pay for my rental service?
我们怎样才能使他不再想到她可悲的损失？我该怎样做才能驱散忧伤？吃上中餐是多么令人愉快啊！暮色中群山是多么壮丽！你跟你的新上司处得如何？大家的反应如何难以估计。我不知道他是怎样被投票罢免的。我来教你我们公司的归档方式。那么租车时我以什么方式来付款呢？

translation: adv. 无论如何；不管怎样（接副词或形容词）；然而；可是conj. 无论以何种方式; 不管怎样
examples: She felt ill. She went to work, however, and tried to concentrate.His first response was to say no. Later, however, he changed his mind.He will never succeed however hard he tries.You won't move that stone, however strong you are.However sly a fox may be, it is no match for a good hunter.
她病了。然而她照旧去上班，并且尽力集中精神工作。他最初的反应是不同意。可是后来他改变了主意。不论他怎样努力,都不会获得成功。不管你力气多大,也休想搬动那块石头。狐狸再狡猾也架不住好猎手。

translation: adj. 巨大的；庞大的；无限的n. (Huge)人名；(英)休奇
examples: The atomic explosion is always accompanied by huge fireball.The huge ship was sunk by a homing missile.The destructive force of the storm is huge.He possesses a huge house on the hillside.Jakarta is crossed by a huge train network.The general commanded a huge army.There is a huge Victorian edifice in the area.There is a huge sales outlet for pocket computers.This is a huge leap compared with past launches.These children have a huge reserve of latent talent.
原子弹爆炸总是伴随着巨大的火球。这只巨大的军舰被一枚自动寻的导弹击中。暴风雨的破坏力是巨大的。他在山上拥有一栋巨宅。雅加达拥有一个庞大的铁路系统。这个将军可以命令庞大的军队。该地区有一幢维多利亚式的庞大建筑物。袖珍电脑有极大的市场。这将实现一个极大的飞跃。这些孩子蕴藏着极大的潜在天赋。

translation: adj. 人的；人类的n. 人；人类n. (Human)人名；(英)休曼
examples: The accident was caused by human error.It is beyond the confines of human knowledge.Her novel shows her keen insight into human character.His cruelty suggests that he is less than human.The need to be loved inheres in human nature.He was the only human on the island.It's human that everyone is eager for success.
这宗事故是人为过失造成的。这超出了人类的知识范围。她的小说显示出她对人性的敏锐洞察力。他的残忍表示他没有人性。对爱的需求生来即存在于人的本性中。他是那个岛上唯一的人。人人都渴望成功,这是人之常情。

translation: 人；人类
examples: The human being struggles with his environment.History is a reservoir of human experience.
人类和环境竞争。历史是人类经历的总汇。

translation: n. 一百；许多adj. 一百的；许多的num. 百；百个
examples: Put two noughts after a seven to make seven hundred.The allied warplanes bombed the country by the hundred.There are more than five hundred people on the playground.Five hundred jobs were axed as a result of government spending cuts.Can you change a hundred for five twenties?
在7后面加两个零成为700。盟军数以百计的飞机轰炸了那个国家。运动场上有五百多人。由于政府缩减经费的缘故，有五百人被突然解雇了。你能把一百块找成五张二十块吗？

translation: adj. 饥饿的；渴望的；荒年的；不毛的
examples: The smell of bread beckoned the hungry boy.A lean and hungry cat came to our door.Wall Street still wants people who are hungry and pushy.The Friz is always hungry for adventure, and that's just what the class gets.
面包香味吸引著那个饥饿的男孩。一只饥饿的瘦猫走到我家门口。华尔街需要的是一些渴望的，积极进取的人。弗瑞斯老师非常喜欢外出探险，而这也正是全班同学所渴望的。

translation: n. 匆忙，急忙v. 仓促（做某事）；催促；（朝某方向）迅速移动；迅速处理n. （英）赫里（人名）
examples: She hurried to the airport.He picked up his bag and hurried off along the platform.Don't let anyone hurry you into making a decision.We'd better hurry to the station by taxi to catch the train.You must hurry up or you cannot finish it in time.In his hurry, his bike ran against a tree.He was in a hurry to leave.You must avoid making decisions in a hurry .They squeezed through the crowd in a hurry.He put on his clothes in a hurry.My wife went home in a hurry only to find the door locked.
她匆匆赶往机场。他拿起提包沿着站台匆忙地走了。不要在任何人的催促下匆促作出决定。为了赶上火车,我们最好赶紧乘出租车去车站。你必须赶紧些, 否则不能及时完成。匆忙中,他的自行车撞树上了。他急切地要离开。你千万不可仓促做出决定。他们急忙从人群中挤了过去。他急忙穿上衣服。我妻子急忙回到家,结果却发现门锁着。

translation: vt. 使受伤；损害；使疼痛；使痛心vi. 感到疼痛；有坏处；带来痛苦n. 痛苦；危害；痛苦的原因adj. 受伤的；痛苦的；受损的n. (Hurt)人名；(德、匈、捷)胡特；(英)赫特
examples: The rumors hurt his reputation badly.She hurt my feelings.I do not want to hurt anybody and be hurted by anybody.It hurts when I try to move my leg.It won't hurt to postpone the meeting for a few more days.The experience left me with a feeling of deep hurt.Did he suffer any hurt?It was a real hurt to her vanity.
流言语大大地损害了他的名誉。她伤害了我的感情。我不想伤害任何人,也不想让任何人所伤害。当我移动我的腿,感到疼痛。会议再延迟几天也无妨。这段经历给我心灵上留下了严重的创伤。他有过什么痛苦吗？这对她的虚荣心真是一个打击。

translation: vt. 节约地使用（或管理）n. 丈夫n. (Husband)人名；(英)赫斯本德
examples: My husband is a stamp collector.Mary accused her husband of snore too loudly.
我丈夫是个集邮者。玛丽指责她丈夫打呼噜太响。

translation: 最好
examples: You had better cross out the last name.You had better see about rooms for us.Before reading the book, you had better ask yourself if you have the time.You had better have another think.Perhaps you and I had better change over; you are more experienced.We had better get under the lee of the hedge until the rain stops.Even a worm will turn. You had better give her a way out.We had better learn by heart as many sentence patterns as we can.
你最好把最后一个名字划掉。你最好替我们去问问有没有房间。在读这本书之前，你最好问问自己是否有时间。你最好再想一想。也许我们的工作还是对换一下好，你比我更有经验。我们最好在树篱下躲一躲等雨停。弱者被逼太甚，也会进行抗争，你最好还是给她一条出路。我们最好尽可能多背句型。

translation: 交上；提交；呈送
examples: He made few friends during his stay in the village.Hand in up your examination paper.He has decided to hand in his resignation.She handed in a brief report of the incident.
他在这个村子逗留的期间，没有交上几个朋友。把你们的卷子交上来。他已经决定递交辞呈。她递交了一份关于那个事件的简要报告。

translation: 分发；施舍；把…拿出来
examples: The teacher had the monitor hand out the papers.I have to make some copy to hand out.At the beginning he would always hand out an outline of the lecture.I rustled up a few helpers to hand out leaflets.
老师让班长分发试卷。我需要复印一些文件以便分发。在演讲开始时，他总是先分发一份提纲。我找到几个助手散发传单。

translation: 感冒，受凉；患感冒
examples: I stayed in bed and nursed my cold.It's easy to catch a cold in the winter.
我患感冒后卧床养病。冬天容易患感冒。

translation: 坚持下去；不挂断；握住不放
examples: I caution you to hang on to that dog or tie it up.He did not expect them to hang on much longer.If you'll just hang on a moment, I'll get it for you.
我劝你把这条狗抓紧或者拴起来。他估计他们坚持不了多久了。如果你暂时不挂断，我取来给你。

translation: 挂断电话；搁置，拖延
examples: I've got to hang up now.Carols mother told her she had talked long enough on the phone and made her hang up.She took her coat off and hung it up.The project was hung up for lack of fund.The ship was hung up on a sandbar three hours.
我现在得挂断了。卡罗尔的母亲对她说她已谈得时间够长了,叫她挂断电话。她脱掉大衣，挂了起来。工程因资金短缺而被搁置下来。那艘轮船在沙洲搁浅了3个小时。

translation: 对…有天赋
examples: She has a natural aptitude for music.Did you know I have a talent for juggling balls?
她在音乐方面极有天赋。过去你知道我玩球挺有天赋吗？

translation: 上课
examples: We have classes from Monday to Friday.Classes can be beguiled with interesting stories.
我们从星期一到星期五上课。有趣的故事使上课时间过得很快。

translation: 玩得高兴，玩得开心
examples: Do not focus on these little things and have fun with your kids.
别计较这些琐碎的事情，好好享受和孩子一起玩的时光。

translation: 必须；不得不
examples: You have to rewrite the article.She had to sever all ties with her parents.You have to take stock of your position.It's a formality that we have to go through.
你不得不重新改写这篇文章。她不得不断绝与父母的一切联系。你必须估计一下你的处境。这是我们必须办理的手续。

translation: 必须；不得不；只好
examples: You have to take stock of your position.It's a formality that we have to go through.You have to rewrite the article.She had to sever all ties with her parents.
你必须估计一下你的处境。这是我们必须办理的手续。你不得不重新改写这篇文章。她不得不断绝与父母的一切联系。

translation: 听说，听说过
examples: I rejoice to hear of your promotion.We have just heard of his marriage to an heiress.
听说你高升我非常高兴。我们刚刚听说他与一位女继承人结了婚。

translation: 收到…的信；受…的批评
examples: When they did not hear from her, they feared the worst.I hear from my cousin every two months.I hear from my cousin every two weeks.It was a pleasure to hear from you.Have you hear from him by last week?Months have elapsed before I hear from my friend again.How often do you hear from your sister?
他们那时听不到她的消息，唯恐发生了最糟的事。我每两个月就会收到我表哥的来信。我每两星期就会收到我表哥的来信。很高兴收到你的信。到上星期为止你们接到过他的信吗？好几个月过去後我才再次收到我朋友的信。你多长时间接到你姐姐一次信?

translation: 自用
examples: For the registration of ownership of a ship built by oneself for one's own use, a document evidencing the procurement of ownership shall be submitted.Here you are.And help yourself to a pie, please.
就自造自用船舶申请船舶所有权登记的，应当提供足以证明其所有权取得的文件。给你，请随意吃馅饼。

translation: 不挂断电话，等一下；继续
examples: He held on to the rock to stop himself slipping.These nuts and bolts hold the wheels on.You should hold on to your oil shares.They managed to hold on until help arrived.He swallowed the insults and kept on working.He gritted his teeth and resolved to hold out.Hold on,please. I'll see if he's in his office.
他紧紧抓住岩石以免自己往下滑。这些螺帽和螺栓把轮子固定住了。你应该继续保留着石油股份。他们设法坚持住直到有救援到来。他忍受侮辱继续努力。他咬紧牙关忍受。请别挂断，我去看看他是否在办公室。

translation: 坚持；伸出；提供；维持；抵制；主张；扣留
examples: The balcony juts out over the swimming pool.They were ready to hold out a friendly hand.The strikers are holding out for a 5% pay increase.He was determined to face it out.
阳台伸出在游泳池上方。他们准备伸出友谊之手。罢工者坚持要求增加工资百分之五。他决心把这事坚持到底。

translation: 举起；阻挡；拦截
examples: He held up his hand in amazement.The pillars hold up the masonry.I decided to hold up on the news until he was sure of it.The train was held up by heavy fog.She was always holding up her children as paragons of good behaviour.Robbers held up a bank at gunpoint.
他惊骇地举起了手。柱子支持着石头房屋。我决定暂缓发布消息，直到我确信准确无误。火车因大雾而受阻。她总是标榜自己的孩子是品行端正的典范。强盗持枪抢劫了一家银行。

translation: 好几百；许许多多
examples: She has coached hundreds of young singers.Among the hundreds of guppy varieties, the best known feature of the male fish is its gorgeous dorsal and caudal fins.
她培养了许许多多的青年歌手。在成千上百的孔雀鱼品种中，雄鱼最著名的特色就是它们华丽的背鳍和尾鳍。

translation: （使）赶快
examples: Please hurry up the dispatch of these telegrams.Let's try to rig up some sort of shelter.
请赶快将这些电报发出去。让我们赶快搭个遮风挡雨的棚吧。
